languages.text: {n}Абеляр щурится и всматривается в Махария и свиту позади него. В цепком взгляде загорается искра, когда тот выхватывает из толпы что-то важное и скрытое. Сенешаль смотрит на вас и кивает: "Кукловод себя выдал. Огласите вердикт".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр щурится и всматривается в Махария и свиту позади него. В цепком взгляде загорается искра, когда тот выхыватывает из толпы что-то важное и скрытое. Сенешаль смотрит на вас и кивает — "Кукловод себя выдал. Огласите решение".{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. His sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods, as if to say: "The puppeteer has given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр щурится и всматривается в Махария и свиту позади него. В цепком взгляде загорается искра, когда тот выхватывает из толпы что-то важное и скрытое. Сенешаль смотрит на вас и кивает: "Кукловод себя выдал. Огласите вердикт".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard squints his eyes and looks at Macharius and his retinue behind him. The sharp eyes light up when he catches something, important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods — "The puppeteer have given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard squints his eyes and looks at Macharius and his retinue behind him. The sharp eyes light up when he catches something, important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods — "The puppeteer have given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard squints and looks at Macharius and his retinue behind him. The sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something, important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods: "The puppeteer have blown their cover. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard squints and looks at Macharius and his retinue behind him. The sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something, important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods: "The puppeteer have blown their cover. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}

Pronounce the verdict."{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは目を細めてマハリウス・ザウアーバックとその後ろの取り巻きたちを見る。鋭い目が光る。何か重要な秘密を群衆の中に見つけたのだ。家令長はあなたを見て頷く。「黒幕は自ら正体を明かしました。評決を宣告しましょう」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. His sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods, as if to say: "The puppeteer has given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは目を細めてマハリウス・ザウアーバックとその後ろの取り巻きたちを見る。鋭い目が光る。何か重要な秘密を群衆の中に見つけたのだ。家令長はあなたを見て頷く。「黒幕は自ら正体を明かしました。評決を宣告しましょう」{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德眯起眼睛，从头到尾打量着马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克和他身后的随从。就在此时，他锐利的目光一闪，似乎发现了潜藏在人群中的某样重要的东西。阿贝拉德朝你点了点头，仿佛在说：“幕后真凶终于露出了狐狸尾巴，宣布您的判决吧。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. His sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods, as if to say: "The puppeteer has given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德眯起眼睛，从头到尾打量着马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克和他身后的随从。就在此时，他锐利的目光一闪，似乎发现了潜藏在人群中的某样重要的东西。阿贝拉德朝你点了点头，仿佛在说：“幕后真凶终于露出了狐狸尾巴，宣布您的判决吧。”{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard observe Macharius et son entourage en plissant les yeux. Son regard s'illumine soudain, comme s'il avait vu quelque chose de crucial dans la foule. Le sénéchal se tourne vers vous et hoche la tête comme pour vous signifier : « Le marionnettiste s'est trahi. Prononcez le verdict. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. His sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods, as if to say: "The puppeteer has given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard observe Macharius et son entourage en plissant les yeux. Son regard s'illumine soudain, comme s'il avait vu quelque chose de crucial dans la foule. Il se tourne vers vous et hoche la tête comme pour vous signifier : « Le marionnettiste s'est trahi. Prononcez le verdict. »{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard entrecierra los ojos y mira a Macharius Sauerback y a todo el séquito que tiene detrás. Sus ojos se iluminan cuando vislumbra algo que parece importante escondido entre la multitud. El Senescal te lanza una mirada y asiente, como diciendo «la persona responsable por todo esto acaba de delatarse; pronuncie el veredicto».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. His sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods, as if to say: "The puppeteer has given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard entrecierra los ojos y mira a Macharius Sauerback y a todo el séquito que tiene detrás. Sus ojos se iluminan cuando vislumbra algo que parece importante escondido entre la multitud. El Senescal te lanza una mirada y asiente, indicando: «Los titiriteros han descubierto su tapadera. Pronuncie el veredicto».{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard kneift die Augen zusammen und mustert Macharius Sauerback und dessen Entourage. Seine scharfen Augen weiten sich, als er etwas Wichtiges entdeckt, das in der Menge verborgen ist. Der Truchsess sieht dich an und nickt, als wolle er sagen: "Der Puppenspieler hat sich verraten. Verkündet das Urteil."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. His sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods, as if to say: "The puppeteer has given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard kneift die Augen zusammen und blickt Macharius und sein hinter ihm stehendes Gefolge an. Die scharfen Augen blitzen auf, als er etwas entdeckt, etwas Wichtiges, was in der Menge verborgen ist. Der Truchsess sieht dich an und nickt: "Der Drahtzieher hat sich enttarnt. Verkündet das Urteil."{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, gözlerini kısıp Macharius Sauerback'i ve yanındaki maiyetini dikkatle inceliyor. Keskin gözleri, kalabalığın arasında gizlenen önemli bir şeye takılınca fal taşı gibi açılıyor. Seneşal sana bakarak başını sallıyor. Mimikleri şöyle diyor: "Kuklacı kendini ele verdi. Kararı açıklayabilirsiniz."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. His sharp eyes light up when he catches sight of something important and hidden in the crowd. The Seneschal looks at you and nods, as if to say: "The puppeteer has given themselves away. Pronounce the verdict."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard gözlerini kısıp Macharius Sauerback'i ve yanındaki maiyetini dikkatle inceliyor. Keskin gözleri, kalabalığın arasında gizlenen önemli bir şeye takılınca fal taşı gibi açılıyor. Seneşal sana bakarak başını sallıyor. Mimikleri sana şöyle diyor: "Kuklacı kendini ele verdi. Kararı açıklayabilirsiniz."{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
